Name: Pain for Pain
Title: La Signora: Pain for Pain
Source: Reward for accepting the Tavern Challenge against La Signora at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives in a Friendly Fracas

Talent.Name: Pain for Pain
Talent.Desc: Can only be played if your active character is $[A2102]: When entering play, generate 3 Elemental Dice of the same Type as <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[A2102]</color>.\nWhen this character takes at least 3 DMG: Negates 1 DMG, then apply <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[K1016]</color> or <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[K1017]</color> to the opposing active character based on $[A2102]'s state. (Once per Round)\n(Your deck must contain $[A2102] to add this card to your deck.)

K1016.Name: Sheer Cold
K1016.Desc: <color=#FFFFFFFF>End Phase:</color> Deal 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#2101}<color=#99FFFFFF>Cryo DMG</color> to the character to which this is attached.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF><color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage(s)</color>:1</color> (When the character with this attached has <color=#FFFFFFFF>Blazing Heat</color> attached to them, remove this effect.)

K1017.Name: Blazing Heat
K1017.Desc: <color=#FFFFFFFF>End Phase:</color> Deal 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#2103}<color=#FF9999FF>Pyro DMG</color> to the character to which this is attached.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF><color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage(s)</color>:1</color> (When the character with this attached has <color=#FFFFFFFF>Sheer Cold</color> attached to them, remove this effect.)
